p.s: Today I want to express, why I think, it would be a good idea to take Shakespeare's sonnets out of the English School Curriculum.

First of all, it is important to say that his language is vey old and almost nobody can understand everything from his sonnets, because of some old and different meanings, which make it hard to understand, whatShakespeare wants to explain us with his sonnets.
The second point is that his language is not common in 2021 and it would not be in the next years.
The people want a simple language and not one, where a word has like five different meanings.
Furthermore, his language is not easy to learn.
He utilizes words like thou or thee, whih are not part of the normal englishEnglish.
It is a waste of time to learn this language.
The last print against Shakespearean sonnets in the curriculum, is that we have other topics with an import once, one should talk about.
For example the climate change or other current topics like the election in Germany or the corona pandemic.
A point for Shakespeare's sonnets is that the sonnets are a part the world literature andShakespeare has also other important plays like Hamlet or Romeo and Juliet.
To sum up, I would say that it would be a good decision to take Shakespeare's sonnets out of the curriculum.
